attributes.action: allow PPI/ Bank charge claims not to be classed as a 'Windfall' in an IVA or Debt Management programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Money owed to claimants in IVA's & Debt Management should be paid back directly to the claimant and the debt should be reduced accordingly, minus the amount paid back to claimant.
Given the current financial climate,we should be able claim back what is rightfully owed as a result of misselling and unfair charging and it should not be lining the pockets of the culprits! WE SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO REDUCE OUR DEBTS ACCORDINGLY- Windfall clause is highly unfair at present!!
